=======
Install
=======

....

Via pip
-------

To install EQSN via pip: :code:`pip install eqsn`.

.. note::
    If you are using EQSN for the QuNetSim simulator, you do not need to install
    EQSN manually. The appropriate version is installed as a dependency of QuNetSim.

....

From source
----------------

To install EQSN from the source code, clone the repository to your drive.
Then open a terminal, go into the cloned directory, and execute following command:

```
pip install .
```

Afterwards, the EQSN package is installed on your system.
